title: The Delinquents (Captioned)
creator_credit: Chris Thomson, Mike Wilcox, Alex Cutler, Silver Lining Entertainment, Wilcox and Cutler
brief_description: Too young to be together, too in love to be apart, Lola and Brownie’s obsessive passion for each other breaks all the rules laid down by their parents and society. Quickly branded as rebels they are forced to separate but they fight all the odds to be reunited. Stars Kylie Minogue, Charlie Schlatter and Angela Punch-McGregor Based on the novel “The Delinquents” by Criena Rohan.
